relation: "Handsomely Handsome Puppet". I'm a big fan of Threed's Handsome Tom. Sure, it was merely an alternate palette version of Smilin' Sam, but come ON! He's a puppet/ dummy that has purple skin and white hair. How creepy is THAT? And how creepy is the person who'd have made him? Handsome Tom is cool.

Another experiment in subdued colours, it's Threed's Handsome Tom, out (or being taken out?) on an evening prowl. For the record, I find that Handsome Tom is infinitly more interesting to colour than his counterpart, Smilin' Sam. I mean, who MAKES a purple-skinned dummy?... Now THAT'S creepy.
Carefree Bomb. I have no idea what he's up to.
Based on a conversation in Onett.
Bipedal Black Antoid, brandished a blaster.
